Restlet API 2.0.2 - Java SE

Restlet is a Java framework for the REST architectural style.

See:
          Description

Restlet API
org.restlet.data Information exchanged by components.
org.restlet.representation Common representation data elements.
org.restlet.resource Client and server resource classes.
org.restlet.routing Classes related to call routing.
org.restlet.security Classes related to security.
org.restlet.service Services used by applications and components.
org.restlet.util Various utility classes.

 

Other Packages
org.restlet Core classes of the API.

 

Restlet is a Java framework for the REST architectural style. This documentation corresponds to the Java Standard Edition edition. It is composed of a Restlet API documented here and of a supporting Restlet Engine. In addition, there are several Restlet Extensions available.

The Restlet framework is led by Noelios Technologies with the help of the Restlet community.

See Also:
REST dissertation by Roy T. Fielding
